      • login

        public void login​(javafx.event.Event event)
        Attempts to login with given username and password. Routes to main screen if successful.
        Parameters:
        event - the event that triggered this method

      • checkForAppointments

        private void checkForAppointments()
        Checks if there are any appointments starting within 15 minutes and displays message to user. Lambda expression is used here to filter the appointments and get only those in the desired timeframe.

      • logAttempt

        public void logAttempt​(java.lang.String user,
                       boolean success)
        Adds the login attempt to the log file.
        Parameters:
        user - the attempted username
        success - the result of the login attempt
